prompts.title: Contract Template - Freelance Work
prompts.prompt:
Create simple freelance contract template for:

Service: [Type of work]
Typical project duration: [Days/Weeks]

Contract sections:

1. **Parties**: Freelancer & Client details
2. **Scope of Work**: What will be done
3. **Deliverables**: Specific outputs
4. **Timeline**: Milestones & deadlines
5. **Payment Terms**: Amount, schedule, method
6. **Revisions**: Number of rounds included
7. **Intellectual Property**: Who owns what
8. **Confidentiality**: NDA clause
9. **Termination**: How to end contract
10. **Signatures**: Date & sign

Tone: Legal but understandable
Length: 2-3 pages equivalent
